content.detailedDescription:
I was laying in bed watching movie aroudn 11:30pm est when i noticed red & blue vertical lights in distance sky across hill over pearl st in distance(maybe a mile away), went to window & saw it pulsing, very 
watched jet or plane pass very far above overhead too when it was to north of town it moved across low sky from north of town to south of town, 

thats when i saw four duller white lights under it & three flashing lights between those four as it was rising & passing along, it was bigger than apartment building next door, maybe 200ft square.

 i called police to ask if military is busy with quiet helicopters etc

 it is now stationary above & right of the big dipper looking south it looks like red light is on top with 2 white lights underneath it in vertical configuration tried to get pics with cell, gopro & nikon d70,once is stopped moving, have pics & video if interested sky is bright with many stars visible, however this is brighter than any star
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Vermont red & blue vertical lights in sky

content.detailedDescription: Went outside at 8:00 to take dog out. i saw a slow flash of light come from a small dim star or what looked like a star. about 10 mins. later it did it again. 5 mins. later it did it again and then it emitted other objects. one of the objects turned into a misty disk shape and separated from the star like object then took off to the north very fast and left a trail that disappeared quickly. it flashed slow again. my friend came outside and saw it flash again right after i said something. then what looked like a star traveled west to the east and then about 10 mins. another one from north to south. the star flashed again and then another separate one. looking up from my view it was right under orion. i see lights and have had alien contact before and i feel that this is them letting me know they are around. there is a port and i thought might be a drone but i watched for about an hour. the flashing ones looked like small stars and the others were very fast. i have seen similar but never saw one go that fast before. they are still outside right now.
content.summary: I saw a slow flash of light come from a star. emitted other objects that turned to mist and moved hyperspeeds

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a walk when all of a sudden i notice a bright light on the horizon between houses i started moving towards the light when i noticed it had moved in the forest, but i could not go in the forest because of all the snow we have here. at first i thought it was a light flashing on a cell tower but then i thought there is no cell tower behind my house and i never saw that light there for all the 7 years i live here. it was a very bright flashing light really bright that it was white/blue in color. i was nervous and anxious to see what it was but mad that i could not gointheforest to get closer due to the snow. idecided to leave after looking at it for 5 minutes as i was getting cold.

this was filmed around 10pm on march 1st 2014 in the forest behind my home. can it be a ufo? the next 2 nights after i went to the same location and saw no lights it was completely black.
content.summary: Light flashing above treetop in forest.

content.detailedDescription: Walking through the woods and noticed movement ahead of me. the object went into the ground the area around this spot has trees all old looking and dead. the air feels very cold as you near the spot. and as you get closer to the central point the sky changes and the land and trees appear different. there is absence of sound and wind at the central point. i have seen several objects at this spot and around this spot.
content.summary: Several events from 1968-1989 went into the ground area very strange looking

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was riding my bike.
2. i heard a sound in the sky that made me look up.
3. a ufo because i never saw anything like it before.
4. it was a tent like shape that was black and white that had something that looked like a clear propeller in the back.  it appeared to be some type of stone surface with a split in the middle and possibly a door with red flashing lights around it.  there were also red flashing lights all the way around the tent like shaped object. it moved through the air at a medium pace but it rose up about two feet doing this three times.  then it just disappeared.
5. when i initially saw it i got scared and froze for a moment.  i ran inside and told my grandfather what i had witnesses.  my grandfather knew something was wrong because he saw a look in my eyes that was different than he ever saw before.  we both ran outside to see if it was still there.  nothing was there so we stood and look in the direction of my last seeing it and then decided to put my bike away and go in the house.
6. it just disappeared.
content.summary: Observed a tent like two tone shaped object with red lights and clear propeller on the back.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were approximately a quarter mile from the brown's ranch trailhead ( on alma school pkwy.) hiking on upper ranch trail when i looked up to catch a glimpse of a nearby hawk overhead. while trying to observe the hawk i noticed a small strange looking object very stationary in the sky almost directly overhead. i grabbed my 10x binoculars to get a better look. the object appeared circular with a red colored bottom and a somewhat silver-gray border around it's edge. i would estimate that it was about 15,000 feet up but it was hard to say for certain. we observed the object for about 15 minutes during which time it showed absolutely no movement. we thought possibly a weather balloon but didn't think a balloon could stay that stationary or possibly some type of drone. we continued our hike for about another 10 minutes and the object remained in position. by the time we got to the parking lot (another 15 minutes or so) we could no longer locate the object. there was a civilian type helicopter that had been making repeated flights back and forth over the area about and hour before the sighting.
content.summary: Observed strange very stationary object thru binoculars

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking long exposures of the arizona night sky in sedona. i was shooting for about an hour.  some of my shots included commercial aircraft and they were easy to point out. but one of my photos had a light that i myself could not explain. i don't believe it was camera movement because the tree in frame is not blurry. it almost looks as if something was tracing constellations in the sky. i could not see this object with my naked eye. it only showed up on my camera. it doesn't look like any flight pattern i am familiar with. 

there are stars with slight trails behind them, but there is no way what we are seeing was movement of camera or stars. it would of happened with all the stars as well as the tree.

there was a small light source which lit up the tree that is in the frame.

my camera specs are: canon 60d 30.0 sec at f/3.5 18mm iso 400. no flash
content.summary: Was taking long exposures of the sedona sky. when i looked at it on my camera after i noticed something weird.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving back from fort collins, colorado to cheyenne, wyoming on i-25 with my buddy. on the outskirts of town (approx 5 to 10 miles south of cheyenne) i saw three lights which i first thought to be a c130. it was coming south and started to bank towards the east. i saw it rotate approximtely 90 degrees such that a plane (let alone a large one) could not sustain lift.I immediately thought whatever it was, it was going crash. 

at that point the lights were straight vertical, 3 lights up and down. it started coming towards as we drove on the interstate northbound. i started to notice as it got closer that it was not a plane. i could not really see any structure. this may have been because the lights were bright, because i was driving, or because it did not have any. as it got closer to us it turned more horizontally (lights maybe 45 degrees or more) and started coming towards my truck that was travelling approximately 75 mph. 

my buddy started yelling at me to hit the gas pedal because we thought it was coming at us and would crash into the interstate. eventually the lights slowed down and whatever it was, was directly above my truck roof (which is opaque, no sunroof or anything). i rolled down my window and stuck my head out to see if i could see it in the rear but my view was obstructed and i do not think anything was visible.
content.summary: Ufo appeared to be plane but rotated 90 degrees then approached got very closer

content.detailedDescription: Large circle found on ice on our frozen lake. it was made overnight, on 03/03/2014. still visable 0n 03/07/2014. photos taken.
content.summary: Circle on frozen lake surface.

content.detailedDescription:
Greetings:

okay . . . here's how it went.  on the afternoon of march 6, 2014 at around 3:45 p.M., here in bartonsville, pennsylvania, i was on the back enclosed sun porch making some jpg photos of old silver dollar coins.  it's nice and bright out there in late afternoon so natural light is all that's needed with the camera iso set at 400.   was using an old nikon d1h digital slr because it somehow takes better close-up pictures than my later model d2 series camera. 

while working there making close up photos, i happened to glance out the window to the southwest and noticed in the blue sky, numerous military jet contrails.  it was first pondered as to what might be going on to get such weekday afternoon military plane activity. looking up again towards the now broken whirlee-gig windmill atop the rear deck upper railing, a blotch of what appeared to be rainbow colored light was seen shining from behind an odd wispy rippled mackerel skin like cloud.  that was about 3:48 p.M. then with the afternoon sun getting low in the west.  it seemed then as if the sun was perhaps shinning into the cloud at a precise angle and reflecting ice crystals making the rainbow colors.   took the d1 camera that i was working with at the time and strolled out onto an ice free area of the back deck to make a couple of pictures. 

about the same time, the light from within the cloud became extremely bright as if something very shiny was up there reflecting the sunlight. noticed then was a stream of what appeared to be exhaust smoke or maybe vapor clouds on the right side before the blinding bright light. i realized then that what was being seen was not a rainbow but something else.   after clicking a couple of more pictures it was seen that the camera battery on the old d1 was getting low.  

i returned inside the house and grabbed the nikon d2hs camera with it���s fresh charged battery and a clean memory flash card with 2.1k empty picture slots. by the time i got back outside the bright light had faded along with most of unusual wispy mackerel skin cloud.   instead, there was more puffy little clouds in a row leading to a strange stationary rust colored blob in the same spot in the sky.  took some more pictures of the unusual clouds and returned inside.  coming back in, i happened to glance outside again to see the reddish blob turning into a brilliant blazing light that was more defined and with what looked two headlights.  the skies all around were also again filled with crisp fresh jet contrails.  noticed too was that the light from the object was shining or reflecting like beams into surrounding clouds.   the wispy rippled cloud around the object appeared again and seemed to get bigger.  series of pictures was made within probably seven or eight minutes.  though i was tempted to put the camera on motor drive at 8-frames per second, it was decided to make more carefully composed individual pictures with foreground images shown so to help with perspective and location.   in total, there are probably 20 or 25 pictures made with two professional grade digital cameras.   of those, some look to be washed out before a lens hood was installed.  the images on the original memory cards have not been modified so that the sequence of photos can be verified.   

attached please find three sample pictures taken yesterday of the described thing in the sky. these are in sequence with time gap between. 

this is f.Y.I.
content.summary: Bartonsville, pa - 3:45 - 3:56 p.M. - mar. 6. 2014 - brilliant object in sw sky - photos attached

content.detailedDescription:
This occured between summer when i was between 5 and 7(between 1985 to 87 ruffly) . my mom and i where watching tv between 8pm and 10pm, when we heard noise outsiide by our window . when she went to check it out, she seen a bright light through curtains . she opened curtains thinking it was my dad and his truck unloading wood in back yard. although he wasn't soppose to be home for a few days, as he trimmed trees and stayed up in mn where he works.When she open curtains to look, it wasn't my dad with his truck, but some type of floating ball just outside our large window . she called me over to see this thing, as i was and still am a ufo believer. 

what i witnessed was a round spear/ball floating outside our large window. we where staring right at it, me having my face against the window. this spear/ball was glowing with multi colors changing(red,blue,orange,white(all i recall color wise)as it hovered about 10 to 20 feet off ground.  i believe it was there hovering between 10 to 20 mins. it than shot up very fast into the sky. we watched it excend into the sky, where we seen another light floating in the sky. 

this object was just a white blinking style light, small in appearance , due to being very high up(airplane flight path hight) in the air. both objects than shot off(direction towards state of minisota) exstreamly fast. they where gone out of sight after 5 secs. we seen(heard from news) that bridge workers have seen something simualar(we think they seen what we did that night) in occurrence to us later that night. we never seen anything like that night again occure again, but i watch the skies for several yrs after that for a return, or to see them(ufos) in skys. 

the exact month date and yr this occured i don't recall , but this is an accurate report and includes everything that occured that night to the best of my knowledge . this ends my report of a very very close encounter of some kind of ufo account.
dusten j mcdonough
content.summary: Late during summer, seen ufo, or something from ufo outside first floor window

content.detailedDescription: So i was on my patio smoking a cigarette and i looked up in the sky blowing the smoke out and i saw a white/gray light or matalic looking ball so i got my phone out and video taped it sitting there and about 6 secs into it it started getting bigger and then smaller and jus sat there in one spot.  later on the news said it was a balloon. ..I don't think so because it never moved and the wind was blowing. ...So i do believe it was a ufo. not the only time i've taped or saw lights in the same area out here in arizona. ....
content.summary: It was sitting in the sky and u could see it get bigger than smaller...Like a light bulb gets britter and then diem

content.detailedDescription:
Me and some friends were walking on the beach in ft. walton fl for our 1980 graduation trip from mobile. we were walking on the beach that night and observed this round object with lights around it going parallel with the beach just off shore maybe 1/2 a mile. then it stopped and dropped down with some bright lights under it and then it seemed to be pulling water out of the gulf up to it.  after about 30 seconds, it lifted up and then took off light a bullet, very strange and definitely was not a plane or chopper.  i had at least 3 friends with me that observed this.  i have since been back there on several other occasions at night during the summer and witnessed other flying objects cruising the coastal waters at destin, ft walton beaches from 1981 through 1985.

thanks,


hope this helps !
content.summary: We saw this object hovering over water in ft walton and then pulling water from gulf and then took off.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back garden smoking a cigarette when i spotted a glowing light in the sky east of my house moving north silently. the object was yellow/orange triangle shaped light and was constantly glowing dimming glowing dimming. it seemed to be at a very high altitude much higher than any plane i've seen and was moving much faster than a plane i estimate 800mph+. i live not far from london city airport and also heathrow airport and right above my house planes will start to turn to land for london city airport but always come from due east or due west, i have observed many planes above my house before small aircraft to military jets but nothing like this.
when i first see this object i thought it was a chinese lantern but then i noticed the light was not flickering.
after i see this object i felt very interested to find out what this was.
i lost sight object when past the rooftop of my house.
content.summary: Glowing plusating light at very hight altitude moving very fast due north

content.detailedDescription: While watching my son hit balls at a downtown dallas driving range, i noticed 6 (six) circular objects traveling across the sky in a ssw direction. it was odd because the location where we were was in line with planes coming in to land at love airfield. and i thought "why are the planes going around instead of coming straight in like normal?" the sky was clear and it was  a couple of minutes before 3:30pm. i alerted to my son to look up and he thought a spider was above his head! he doesn't like them. at that moment i stood up and said right there! he said he didn't see them and again i said "right there!" and at that moment the silver orbs all 6 of them at the exact same time and in unison turned what looked like a yellowish-orange light towards us as if they knew we were watching them. after my son said "i see them!" the yellowish-orange light turned back to the direction they were traveling, and then the silver outer skin on all 6 at the exact same time and in one motion all seemed to disappear into the sky. not like they sped off or anything like that, but like the outer skin just turned mirror like so as to seem invisible. after they disappeared, we laughed and thought no one will believe us, we didn't care, because we know what we saw. it seems like yesterday, it's still very clear in my mind.
content.summary: Playing golf with son, looked up saw 6 objects flying in formation, when pointed out to my son all objects turned a light towards us then all six outer skin seemed to turn reflective of sky making them invisible.

content.detailedDescription: We,carla wright,and 2 friends were on our way to pick up friend from work.Noticed bright light in sky.Light was bright enough to see from other lights.Stopped to see what it was,thought it was a metior.It came down towards a plane ,commerial type,thought it was gojng to hit it.Fireball stopped as if to let plane pass, than continued.It made zig zag pass,glowed brighter,dimmer.Had tenticles(shaftes of light come out from top and bottom)shoot from top and bottom.It dimmed to almost nothing,we thought it was gone than came back on and finally disappeared behind mountain.My friend recorded the whole event on her vidiophone.Sent her mother a copy.I was thrilled,scared and praying while watching this,we all were. i'm relating this from what my daughter carla and friends saw.They have no idea what they saw or what mufon is.They were the eyewitnesses to this event,recorded it and would like some answers.They don't drink,do drugs or need to make stuff up for attention.They get plenty of that.My name and number is at top and i can put someone in touch with them.Theres more detail, but i can only hear so fast when listioning to an excited carla
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Related to me from daughter,driving thru sutton wv to pick up friend from work.Noticed bright light in sky, we stopped to see what it was.

content.detailedDescription: We had gone camping at calico ghost town,for calico days in the mohave desert, ca, i believe it was sept. 1973. ( i am sure about the year, just not the month) that night mike, sandy, laura, and my self slept out side, we were making out with the girls when mike stood up and asked "what's that ?" the time was approx. 2 am, i rolled over and saw what i thought was the moon shining through a weather balloon and told mike "it's just a weather balloon." and rolled over back to sandy when mike said, "that isn't a balloon." when i rolled over onto my back i could now see a large triangular craft approx. 300 ft. across, and approx. 300 ft. off the ground slowly moving over the top of us. what i thought was the moon shining through a balloon now looked more like an observation bubble under the nose of the craft, and it was glowing a dull light purple in color. as it moved over it made no sound, and i saw no lights, but as it cleared the moon you could see the light reflect off the craft and it gave it the color of gun metal blue, and the edges appeared to be rounded. it continued its slow moving progress away from us following the hills of the desert, and flying just above hill top level. mike and i then got up and started putting on our shoes while the girls begged us not to follow fearing something was going to happen to us. so we followed running up hills, then down one and up another, but the craft got further away each time so we stopped and just watched. i saw no sign of an engine, and we heard no sounds. had it not been for the fact it flew right over the top of us we would never even had known it was there. my feeling was that the craft was running in stealth mode, no lights and at very low levels to avoid detection. what struck me so odd, was back then it was supposed to be fast moving shinny disk shaped objects, like in "chariots of the gods" i did not see anything like what we saw until i watched a program on tv describing the same thing i saw, except ours did not have any of the lights mentioned.
content.summary: Was sleeping outside making out with girl friends when the moon was suddenly  blocked out, we looked up and noticed a craft directly above us.

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside waiting for the dog and always watch the night sky.  have seen many unexplainable objects but this one was stunning.  it came from the right side of the house as i was facing west.  it was so large i saw it immediately with peripheral vision and turned slightly to my right to see it track rapidly toward the west.  movement was rapid but slow enough for me to get a good look to see defined edges; that it was oval from my vantage point and that it looked like it had clouds inside.  i realized it was probably reflecting ground lights instead.  there was no question that it was a disk of some sort.  the sky was crystal clear with stars.  it appeared to have a specific destination, not like some i've seen at a distance in multiples that change directions and altitudes and stay in the same general part of the sky before disappearing. i waited for another ten minutes to see if it would change direction and come back, but it didn't.  it disappeared over the woods without ever changing altitude.  it had a strange dull gray glow, which color is almost impossible to describe.  i wasn't afraid - probably because it kept going - but instead felt a sense of awe over it being so huge and so close. i haven't been able to get it out of my mind so thought i should report it.
content.summary: Huge oval object with distinct edges, appeared to reflect ground lights.

content.detailedDescription:
March 2-3, 2014. at 11:00 off jensen beach. pm witness saw dark grey object with bright light on bottom. the object appeared triangular in shape with blue light around the perimeter. a dime would cover the object. the object appeared "thick" and about 50 feet long. the object hovered, flashed light, and moved erratically. witness said that he flashed a halogen light light at it, whereon it "went out" and then flashed back. a helicopter circled the area but the  object "disappeared" only to reappear after the helicopter left.  

witness watched the object for seven hours and took several pictures. it finally gained altitude and disappeared over the ocean.

according to the witness, approximately 35 people stopped to look at the object. 


witness is assistant manager of golden corral.  he has seen ufos several times. 

latitude 26.333208 n  longitude 80.320710 w

submitted by: mary margaret zimmer,  ssd, fi, miami, fl
content.summary: Triangular object with light on bottom seen for 7 hours

content.detailedDescription: It was a friday. last day of february 2014. i was driving home from park and had kids sitting in the backseat. as the sun was going down around 7:15-7:30 to the left down 8st and 42ave. i noticed a single light orb floating over commercial buildings. i was curious. i had time. had the kids so decided to drive to it. but traffic began to build. i can see it going from one building top to another. low. when i couldn't get around traffic. i looked to right and noticed another set across street. this one was flicking in three set pulses and also low. above homes. this one was in my residence area. i turn in quickly and followed. i managed to get some video at dusk as it flicked low and silently above homes towards the northwest. i had kids with me so after video i called off the tracking.
content.summary: Flickering lights above houses

content.detailedDescription: I came home from yoga school and i was about to go out to look for a job teaching yoga when my dad attacked me. he called police and told them i attacked him. instead of taking me to police station they took me to hospital emergency room. few days later i was transferred to mental hospital. i had no history of mental illness and i have no mental illness currently. i'm currently successful at what i do in my carreer. i have no explanation for his bizarre behavior other than that he is an alien trying to prevent me from helping people with yoga. i believe the aliens are tied closely to the government. they have advanced technology but very primitive unemotional brains. their weakness is our humanity and love for one another.
content.summary: I think my father is an alien or at least half alien

content.detailedDescription: I was driving 53 foot truck trailer from ontario mississauga to ontario california..I think we had same auto parts for delivery.Me and other driver :-) during siding he has ben sleap.It was aproximateli 3 am i was on hwy 15 s   100 km before las vegas .I saw in far distance behind my truck same 1000 m strong light. first i taught that is other truck -but those light aproche me very fast.In fue secend ben same 20 to 30 m behind my truck--what happen next is samthing unexplayned-strong light shape as semy truck start past my truck. those truck wasn't solid it was like projection.When it get to my position :-) side by side:-)  i realised that i see other driver who is looking straight to hwy and is focus on passing my truck:-) during passing other truck look like projection to me:-) during passing 130 km per h other truck:-) light projection:-) start split with my truck. in same moment other driver was same 1 m from my truck seat.Strench situation. we ben driving for same 1 no more than 3 miles side by side.During that time other truck split with my 3 or 4 times.Than he turn e. but there was no hwy! just desert.Than i realised that those light :-) shape like truck:-) flooting same 1 m above graund.I have to mentioned that other drive clothing was from same 1950 1960 years.He look to me like very tire, he had bear because he didnt shave his face for week. the saiting took same 3 to 5 min than truck dispeer in desert i don't know if it was ufo or same military projection project.It happen long time ago but i have to thinking about it all time. i must mentioned that when i return back to canada i saw doctor due to tirenes. blood sample was taken and was find that my white blood cell is very high. i don't know if is related to siaiting but since that time i am on disability for cml leukemia.
content.summary: Truck shape projection

content.detailedDescription: I was driving 53 foot truck trailer from ontario mississauga to ontario california..I think we had same auto parts for delivery.Me and other driver :-) during siding he has ben sleap.It was aproximateli 3 am i was on hwy 15 s   100 km before las vegas .I saw in far distance behind my truck same 1000 m strong light. first i taught that is other truck -but those light aproche me very fast.In fue secend ben same 20 to 30 m behind my truck--what happen next is samthing unexplayned-strong light shape as semy truck start past my truck. those truck wasn't solid it was like projection.When it get to my position :-) side by side:-)  i realised that i see other driver who is looking straight to hwy and is focus on passing my truck:-) during passing other truck look like projection to me:-) during passing 130 km per h other truck:-) light projection:-) start split with my truck. in same moment other driver was same 1 m from my truck seat.Strench situation. we ben driving for same 1 no more than 3 miles side by side.During that time other truck split with my 3 or 4 times.Than he turn e. but there was no hwy! just desert.Than i realised that those light :-) shape like truck:-) flooting same 1 m above graund.I have to mentioned that other drive clothing was from same 1950 1960 years.He look to me like very tire, he had bear because he didnt shave his face for week. the saiting took same 3 to 5 min than truck dispeer in desert i don't know if it was ufo or same military projection project.It happen long time ago but i have to thinking about it all time. i must mentioned that when i return back to canada i saw doctor due to tirenes. blood sample was taken and was find that my white blood cell is very high. i don't know if is related to siaiting but since that time i am on disability for cml leukemia.

content.detailedDescription:
1 i photographed my wife at a place called "the gap" south of sydney harbour.
2 i did not see the object until i look at the screen after the shot was taken.
3 i thought it was a ufo moving at speed.
4 the shutter speed was one two fiftieth of a second, and the object was blurred. it has a white spot on the rhs of it.
content.summary: I photographed my wife and found a grey blurred object in the image which would have been over sydney harbour

content.detailedDescription: I was sat in my girlfriends car up manmoel mountain enjoying the clear evening watching the stars. after appprox 2 hours of us being there 3 bright lights in the shape of a triangle appeared from no where. you could see a solid shape to it but not clearly as the lights were so bright. at first we thought it was a police helicopter before realising there was no sound coming from the craft as it just hovered there. it made minor abrupt movements as if it was keeping itself stable by moving ever so slightly but extreamly fast if that makes sense. after observing for a few minutes i had a cold sensation come over me and i said to my girlfriend that i didn't feel safe all of a sudden and that we should go. we turned the car round and headed down the mountain road in the opposite direction with the lights behind. suddenly the lights vanished from behind and appeared directly in front of us, this time they seemed lower as it lit the road ahead slightly. as we drove and changed direction in the lane the lights stayed exactly in front of us, as if they were watching us through the front windscreen. then half way down the mountain the lights shot off towards the sky with incredible speed and vanished out of sight within a few seconds. moments later 2 police cars arrived driving up the lane at a high speed. the police drove straight past us and up to the mountain.
content.summary: Triangular shape with 3 lights hoveringin front. followed our car in opposite direction

content.detailedDescription: on august 2 1965, me and my friend david were wrestling in my back yard. he had me pinned down and it was then that i spotted a silver mettalic disc hovering above the trees behind us. i do not know how long it was there. we got up and walked closer to observe it. we stood there trying to figure out what this was by naming off anything we knew. i remembered my mother was in the house and i went in the house to get her. she was on the phone. i ran back out and the object had moved off in the direction of the river. my mother came out several minutes later but it was gone by then. it made no sound. it reflected the sun so i know it was real. it was viewed for several minutes by both david and i. we were afraid of being made fun of so we did not report it to anybody. through the years i have told this to friends and family.
content.summary: Silent silver metallic disc that hovered several minutes with no sound. daylight observation.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside smoking a cigarette at my parents house.  i looked to the north, and saw a object moving at about the speed of a small aircraft.  the lights where very intense, and really unexplainable in the way they flashed.  but there was a almost chaotic repetition.  i went inside and alerted my parents, who promptly came out to see.  

we watched the object for about 2 more minutes, noticing a small aircraft flying in the same flight path, but it was quite a distance away.  

everything continued the same until my mother yelled at it, trying to communicate with it.  i know odd right, but this is not the first time we have seen things like this.  

after my mother yelled at it, it changed color very quickly.  it then became a red object which seemed to be pulsating.  it got brighter, and it looked like it skipped.  when i say skipped it was like it disappeared, and appeared probably 100 foot or so faster than it had been flying, hard to tell.  it did this a few times, then it got really bright red, like an explosion of sorts, but not.

and it was gone.

p.S. i have been seeing quite a few of these ufo's before and after this indecent.   last week i spotted 3 of them to the west.  one dancing and swirling.  and then again last night i saw two at my house.  one moved up really fast like a fish swimming up, then hovered, and repeated this a few times.  note, if try to record them, they always just stop moving, like they are pretending to just be a star. lol

have a great day.
content.summary: Bright flashing object, at the end it turns red and dissapears

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home after work, through hide-a-way lake development in carriere, ms. just past clubhouse, when i observed an object just above the roof of a house that was just built (not yet occupied), on the right side of a left turn in the roadway. i quickly made a right turn into the houses driveway to get a better look, unaware of what the object was. initial observation was a row of lights (dull red and green) in a row spread the length of the house yet beyond the roof line on both ends. the vague outline of the object was approx. 20' above the roof, and was approx. 20' wider than the width of the house. the row of lights ran along approx. the lower third of the  objects height. after sitting in the driveway approx. 20-25' from the house in the driveway in my pickup (maybe 1 min.), i turned off the engine and climbed out of the cab, and onto the bed, leaning against the roof of the cab observing in awe. my "scientific" mind was analyzing the data i was witnessing as soon as i could, fearing that it might leave. it was soundless, nothing....It was motionless, the lights were dull, but easily visible. cars were driving past, seemingly unaware of the object, as it was off to the right of the road, as it makes a left rounded turn. i was fixated on the object, not wanted to miss anything, yet was amazed none of the cars going by seemed to notice the object. the outline of the object itself was vague, being black like the night sky. after what seemed like forever, my emotions were observational initially, taking in all that i could, then after running mentally through all the logical explanations of what it could be, and concluding it was "unknown",....Suddenly, i felt the onset of fear, realizing that whatever it was, or whoever was in it, had to also be observing me! being so close (estimate 50'),.... fear suddenly took over my emotions, thinking to myself, i need to get out of here, before "something" happens!?? just about that time, as fear entered my mind....The object started slowly moving to my right, maybe 5-10 mph, crossing over the subdivisions fence line, and across the neighboring golf course. i watched it slowly go across the golf course towards the sw, which i later lined up to be towards an electrical substation on hwy 11,...Then after about 3-5 mi jtes in that area, it shot extremely fast straight up at about a 10 degree angle to the east,....Up and out of sight...At a speed i've never witnessed (within seconds 1000's of feet up into the night sky and gone).
i immediately drove home about 3 minutes away....Told my wife what i just saw, and called my uncle, who was and air force base commander in duluth, mn. and minot, nd....Who had told us of ufo sightings while he was on duty on several occasions in the past. he verified the definition of my experience as "normal" occurrences regarding how i described it at that time. i have not reported this incident until now because of fear of ridicule. the experience is as real today in my memory as it was way back then. the is 100% no uncertainty that it was a ufo, and nothing in modern aviation today can fly soundless, and directionally as that object did,...I assume, it was magnetic in power source, as the only explanation of its qualities.
content.summary: Driving home, witnessed hovering large object directly over a home just built in subdivision, pulled into driveway and observed object approx. 10 minutes, got out of pickup and climbed on bed of trick to view.

content.detailedDescription: Driving west on garfield into my complex i noticed a light int he sky and it was not a star nor an aircraft, i pulled into my neighborhood and stopped to observe, contacted my wife via phone to meet my outside and we observed the object mover from east toward the west for a short distance slowing, then stop, no marking light nor typical aircraft type features. then air of a sudden a object fell toward the earth straight down glowing as if on fire it glowed until i lost sight in the tree line, the main object remained overhead and then all of a sudden it dropped another object than another for a total of 4 and then faded and disappeared
content.summary: Glowing object in the night sky

content.detailedDescription: Afer finishing our rounds we were in the control room talking when the phone rang, it was the security guard at the switchyard he was hysterical. so the shift supervisor told us to get out there and see what was going on. when we got to the switchyard the guard was out of his mind, saying they were going to get him. we asked him who? he pointed to the transmission lines and said them! we looked and there two black ufo's floating over the power lines, i asked the other operator with me if he could see them, he said yes we wathed them for maybe five minutes or less and went back the controll room, and took the security guard back with us.
content.summary: Two ufo's black mate color with running lights
